item.title: NUMA documents
item.description: numastat to collect the memory consumption Displays Memory statistics for each NUMA(Non-Uniform Memory Architecture) node $ numastat node0 numa_hit 2419687 numa_miss 0 numa_foreign 0 interleave_hit 17197 local_node 2419687 other_node 0 Output items numa_hit: The expected memory was successfully allocated on this node numa_miss: Memory is allocated on this node, but the process uses a different node. Each numa_miss has a numa_foreign on another node numa_foreign: The memory for the new node is actually allocated to other nodes, and each numa_foreign has a numa_miss on another node
